summary: Wealthy Steve Battier (Rutger Hauer) is desperate to find a way to stay alive, as he is old and terminally ill. When a company known as "R.P.G." offers him the chance to become young again in return for a large amount of money, he doesn't think twice.
cast: Cian Barry|Alix Wilton Regan|Nik Xhelilaj|Pedro Granger|Christopher Goh|Genevieve Capovilla|Dafne Fernández|Reuben-Henry Biggs|Cloudia Swann|Débora Monteiro|Rutger Hauer|Chris Tashima|Soraia Chaves|Victoria Guerra|Duarte Grilo|Tino Navarro|Johan Karlberg
title: Real Playing Game
